headline: Data Center Developers Turn To Distributed Behind-The-Meter Power
summary: Modular, behind-the-meter power generation solutions are gaining traction among data center developers looking to bypass regulatory and interconnection hurdles.

raw.headline: Data Center Developers Turn To Distributed Behind-The-Meter Power

headline: What Recent Analyst Upgrades Mean for NRG Energy’s Valuation and Growth Story
summary: NRG Energy's consensus analyst price target has risen slightly, moving from $191.95 to $194.77. This reflects continued optimism among market watchers. The adjustment highlights analysts' confidence in the company's ability to capitalize on growth opportunities amid sector tailwinds and evolving power demand trends. Stay tuned to discover how you can stay ahead of the curve as NRG's evolving story continues to impact its outlook. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst commentary on...
